amendment.description: Amendment requires that mass mailings by Members of the House include a notice that the mailing was prepared, published, and mailed at taxpayer expense and requires the disclosure and cost of the mass mailings for each Member.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 8 in House Rept. 104-663, to require Members to disclose the number and cost of each mass mailing sent by their offices and to publish that information in the Congressional Record four times per year.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Castle amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
